testsuite.name: technologyRisk.DropdownSubControlNameIfOperationalRadioButtonAndContingencyPlaningOptionSelected

Successfully clicked on Technology Risk Assessment text on Hipaa Risk Management Page Successfully clicked on Risk Assessment on left navigation bar in technology risks page The Operational Configuration Management Sub Control Name Dropdown options from UI are
CONTINGENCY PLANNING POLICY AND PROCEDURES CONTINGENCY PLAN CONTINGENCY TRAINING CONTINGENCY PLAN TESTING CONTINGENCY PLAN UPDATE ALTERNATE STORAGE SITE ALTERNATE PROCESSING SITE TELECOMMUNICATIONS SERVICES INFORMATION SYSTEM BACKUP INFORMATION SYSTEM RECOVERY AND RECONSTITUTION ALTERNATE COMMUNICATIONS PROTOCOLS SAFE MODE ALTERNATIVE SECURITY MECHANISMS
